scripts.clean:reports: if exist cypress\reports rmdir /s/q cypress\reports && mkdir cypress\reports && mkdir cypress\reports\mochareports
scripts.cy:uat-chrome: npx cypress run --env fileConfig=uat --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/ --env allure=true
scripts.cy:uat-firefox: npx cypress run --env fileConfig=uat --browser firefox --spec cypress/e2e/ --env allure=true
scripts.cy:uat-edge: npx cypress run --env fileConfig=uat --browser edge --spec cypress/e2e/ --env allure=true
scripts.cy:dev: npx cypress run --env fileConfig=development --config --spec cypress/e2e/ --env allure=true
scripts.cy:dev-chrome: npx cypress run --env fileConfig=development --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/ --env allure=true
scripts.cy:dev-firefox: npx cypress run --env fileConfig=development --browser firefox --spec cypress/e2e/ --env allure=true
scripts.cy:dev-edge: npx cypress run --env fileConfig=development --browser edge --spec cypress/e2e/ --env allure=true
